name: Confidentiality Clause
description: The agreement must contain a confidentiality obligation protecting sensitive information.

name: Termination Notice
description: Contract must specify the required notice period for termination.

name: Governing Law
description: Contract should clearly specify the governing jurisdiction.

name: Liability Limitation
description: Should define limits of liability for both parties.

name: Payment Terms
description: Contract must state payment timeline and method.

name: Intellectual Property
description: Contract should clarify ownership of intellectual property.

name: Non-Compete Clause
description: If applicable, contract should include non-compete restrictions.

name: Force Majeure
description: Must include a force majeure clause.

name: Warranties
description: Defines warranties offered by each party.

name: Assignment Clause
description: Contract must state whether assignment to third parties is allowed.

name: Data Protection
description: Must adhere to data privacy requirements.

name: Audit Rights
description: Should define audit rights and obligations.
